wikipedia_page.main: Natalie Jessica Evans, Baroness Evans of Bowes Park,  (born 29 November 1975) is a British politician serving as Leader of the House of Lords since 2016. A member of the Conservative Party, she was made a life peer in 2014 and is the first Leader of the House of Lords to serve under two different prime ministers since Lord Shepherd in 1974 and the longest serving lords leader since 1957.
